all-modules.name: combat-carousel
all-modules.title: Combat Carousel

all-modules.name: compendium-browser
all-modules.title: Compendium Browser
all-modules.description:
Easily browse and filter spells, feats, items, and npcs loaded from compendia!

Verified with Foundry 9 and 10 only

Compendium Browser is faster and better-behaved; it no longer loads all the compendia into memory on start-up (which sometimes hung servers because of memory or CPU requirements). Instead, it filters and loads on-demand, as well as giving you a Module Setting to control how many rows are loaded at a time.
Changes in 0.7.0: Supports Foundry 0.8+ only; faster searches using Foundry 0.8 queries!

all-modules.name: compendium-folders
all-modules.title: Compendium Folders

all-modules.title: Dynamic effects using Active Effects
all-modules.description: replacement for dynamic effects

all-modules.name: df-qol
all-modules.title: DF Quality of Life

all-modules.name: df-templates
all-modules.title: DF Template Enhancements
all-modules.description: Enhanced templates for different types of grid targetting.

all-modules.name: dfreds-convenient-effects

all-modules.description: Adds easy to use toggleable active effects for common use cases

all-modules.name: dfreds-effects-panel
all-modules.title: DFreds Effects Panel
all-modules.description: A FoundryVTT module that adds a panel of active effects for the selected tokens.

all-modules.name: dice-calculator
all-modules.title: Dice Tray
all-modules.description: Adds a dice tray below chat, and turns the d20 near chat into a dice calculator.

all-modules.name: dice-so-nice
all-modules.title: Dice So Nice!
all-modules.description: Adds the ability to show a nice 3D dice simulation when a roll is made.

all-modules.name: dnd5e-helpers
all-modules.title: DnD5e Helpers
all-modules.description: Little helpers for little tasks.

all-modules.name: drider-of-the-underworld
all-modules.title: Drider of the Underworld
all-modules.description: Shrouded in mystery, the drider have long been an enigma, with descriptions of the creatures varying between gorgeous and grotesque. Now, for the first time, the secrets of the goddess-cursed drider are revealed from their very own lips (and mandibles)! In this book, you will learn about the secrets and horrible truths of Aventyr’s drider species as well as all the tools you need to incorporate them as playable characters… or adversaries.

all-modules.name: find-the-culprit
all-modules.title: Find the culprit
all-modules.description:
This module helps you to find a module causing issues, by automating the process of deactivating and reactivating modules.
Just click the 'Find the culprit' button inside Module Management.

all-modules.name: foundryvtt-simple-calendar
all-modules.title: Simple Calendar
all-modules.description: A simple calendar module for keeping track of game days and events.

all-modules.name: fvtt-trazzm-homebrew-5e
all-modules.title: Trazzm 5e Homebrew
all-modules.description: A collection of homebrew for dnd5e

all-modules.name: fxmaster
all-modules.title: FXMaster
all-modules.description: Adds various weather and filter effects

all-modules.name: item-piles
all-modules.title: Item Piles
all-modules.description: This module adds the ability for items to be dropped onto the ground, and then picked up.

all-modules.name: itemacro
all-modules.title: Item Macro
all-modules.description: A module that allows macros to be stored in items and executed in various places.

all-modules.name: jb2a_patreon
all-modules.title: JB2A - Patreon Complete Collection
all-modules.description:
Animated Assets for spells, tiles, tokens, melee and ranged attacks

Thank you for the support ! ❤️

all-modules.name: lets-trade-5e
all-modules.title: Let's Trade 5e
all-modules.description: A Foundry VTT module which allows you to send and receive items from other players.

all-modules.name: levels
all-modules.title: Levels
all-modules.description: Add multiple vertical levels to maps

all-modules.name: lib-wrapper
all-modules.title: libWrapper
all-modules.description: Library for wrapping core Foundry VTT methods, meant to improve compatibility between packages that wrap the same methods.

all-modules.name: LockView
all-modules.title: Lock View
all-modules.description: Locks the view of players by enabling the GM to block zooming and panning. The module also gives control over the player view, allowing the GM to zoom and pan. Developed for the purpose of play on a digital playmat, such as a horizontally mounted TV, and for that purpose the module can scale the scene so the gridsize is always displayed corresponding to a real-world size.

all-modules.name: maestro
all-modules.title: Maestro
all-modules.description: Adds new sound-related features such as Hype Tracks and Item Tracks

all-modules.name: magicitems
all-modules.title: Magic Items
all-modules.description: Module that adds the ability to create magical items with spells or feats that belong to the item itself, such as staffs or magic wands, which will be automatically inherited from the character who owns the item.

all-modules.name: midi-qol
all-modules.title: Midi QOL
all-modules.description: Automates rolling weapon/spell attacks and applying damage

all-modules.name: midi-srd
all-modules.title: Midi SRD
all-modules.description: DnD 5e SRD items, features and spells configured for Dynamic Active Effects and Midi QoL

all-modules.name: monks-active-tiles
all-modules.title: Monk's Active Tile Triggers
all-modules.description: Want to teleport, or open doors, or hide characters, or display a message, or play a sound, or change a token's elevation when a token walks over a tile... now you can

all-modules.name: monks-tokenbar
all-modules.title: Monk's TokenBar
all-modules.description: Add a bar with all the current player tokens.  Limit movement, roll saving throws, assign XP.

all-modules.name: Next-Up
all-modules.title: Next Up
all-modules.description: Several Combat Enhancements, pan to combatant, open sheets and turn markers.

all-modules.name: pointer
all-modules.title: PnP - Pointer and Pings!
all-modules.description:
Gives all players the option to show a customizable cursor on demand, as well as ping any location with a custom ping!
Hotkeys, pings, pointer, everything customizable!
As GM you can also move your players view to your pin on demand.

all-modules.name: polyglot
all-modules.title: Polyglot
all-modules.description: Talk to others using a language you can speak and scrambles text you can't understand, in several fantasy scripts.

all-modules.name: rise-of-the-drow
all-modules.title: Rise of the Drow
all-modules.description:
Tonight, a ceremony of light is taking place on the surfeace. Meanwhile, a world away in the city of spiders, a drow matron solidifies a pact with soul-consuming entities who require great sacrifices in the trade for unimaginable power. Drow eyes turn to the surface.

This Foundry World contatins a mega-adventure and setting taking characters across the surface and into the depths of the world. Adventures will meet unique denizens, battle horrors of the Underworld, explore epic locations, and fight to stop the rise of the drow.

Compatible with the world's most popular roleplaying game, this 5th Edition adventure takes 4-6 heroes from 1st to 15th level.

The following books are recommended but not required to play: Underworld Races & Classes, Occult Secrets of the Underworld, and Survivalist Guide to Spelunking (available on Foundry).

all-modules.name: scene-packer
all-modules.title: Library: Scene Packer
all-modules.description: A module to assist with Scene and Adventure packing and unpacking.

all-modules.name: sequencer
all-modules.title: Sequencer
all-modules.description: This module implements an advanced sequencer that can be used for managing a flow of a pipeline, like sequencing a set of actions or animations

all-modules.name: shared-characters
all-modules.title: Shared Characters
all-modules.description: Module used for character arcives. The module will be used for player characters, so that once they are created, they can be moved between games, systems and Dungeon Masters

all-modules.name: socketlib
all-modules.title: socketlib
all-modules.description: A library for easier handling of foundry sockets

all-modules.name: splatter
all-modules.title: Splatter
all-modules.description: Blood up your games

all-modules.name: tidy-ui_game-settings
all-modules.title: Tidy UI - Game Settings
all-modules.description: User Interface Improvements for the Game Settings Window

all-modules.name: tidy5e-sheet
all-modules.title: Tidy5e Sheet
all-modules.description: Replaces the default D&D 5e character and NPC sheet with an alternate layout focused on a cleaner UI

all-modules.name: times-up
all-modules.title: Times Up
all-modules.description: Active expiry expiration

all-modules.name: token-mold
all-modules.title: Token Mold
all-modules.description:
Gives the option to cast your tokens into a mold of your choosing.

Possible options for your mold include:

  • Adding incrementing number suffixes.
  • Name generation for tokens.
  • Random adjective prefixes. (Examples: angry, calm, bloodthirsty, ...)
  • Rolling Hit Points by formula (dnd5e only)
  • Set token configuration on placement.
  • Providing an overlay to quickly check some stats on token hover.
  • Automatic creature size scaling (dnd5e only)

all-modules.name: tokenmagic
all-modules.title: Token Magic FX
all-modules.description: Add special effects and animations on your tokens, tiles, drawings and templates.

all-modules.name: tome-of-heroes
all-modules.title: Tome of Heroes
all-modules.description: Tome of Heroes for 5th Edition delivers character options galore—heroic choices that have been judged and found worthy! New styles of magic and new weapon options, all-new monk paths, the riverfolk halflings and expanded catfolk, the soulspy rogue, a Path of the Dragon for barbarians, cleric domains—and much more. Discover a beautiful, well-organized tome of 5E DnD character races, backgrounds, and classes to expand your game in new directions!

all-modules.name: wall-height
all-modules.title: Wall Height
all-modules.description: Adds the ability to set wall height for walls so that tokens can look and move over them.

all-modules.name: warpgate
all-modules.title: Warp Gate
all-modules.description: Utility module for spawning and modifying tokens.
